content.en: Soft Robotics: Researchers are exploring how soft computing techniques, such as fuzzy reasoning, neural networks, and genetic algorithms, can improve the control of robot manipulators. They are also investigating the use of specific algorithms, such as neural network design, time-delay neuro-fuzzy networks, sliding-mode neural-network control systems, and robust fuzzy-neural-network control systems, for high-precision position control and trajectory tracking of robot manipulators. These algorithms aim to enhance the adaptive control and performance of robotic systems.
content.da: Bløde robotter: Forskere undersøger, hvordan bløde computerteknikker, såsom fuzzy logik, neurale netværk og genetiske algoritmer, kan forbedre styringen af robotmanipulatorer. De undersøger også brugen af specifikke algoritmer, såsom neuralt netværksdesign, tidsforsinkede neuro-fuzzy netværk, glide-mode neurale-netværksstyringssystemer og robuste fuzzy-neurale-netværksstyringssystemer, til højpræcision positionskontrol og baneovervågning af robotmanipulatorer. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at forbedre den adaptive kontrol og ydeevne af robotiske systemer.
